summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of duso_ecom e-commerce website new features. All requested features working correctly: Header dropdown menu on hover, top bar with CIS countries, Hero section with 2x2 image grid (no overlap), Live Chat appearing after 3 seconds with form fields (name, phone, email, telegram), Contact page with budget selector and escaping 'БЕСПЛАТНО' button, 'Кому мы подходим' section with 6 categories, 'Процесс от идеи до запуска' section with 6 steps, Awards section with partners, and navigation between all pages.

issues: ResizeObserver loop warning appears in console - non-critical browser warning, does not affect functionality
Emergent badge overlays the Live Chat toggle button in dev environment - expected behavior as noted in review request

critical_code_review_comments: All data-testid attributes properly implemented for testing
Header dropdown menu works correctly on hover over 'Услуги'
Top bar displays CIS countries (Russia, Ukraine, Kazakhstan, Belarus) and contact info
Hero section images in 2x2 grid layout without overlap
Live Chat appears after 3 seconds with bubble notification
Live Chat form collects: name, phone, email, telegram, message
Contact page form has all required fields including budget selector
'БЕСПЛАТНО' button escapes from cursor on hover
'Кому мы подходим' section displays 6 audience categories
'Процесс от идеи до запуска' section displays 6 process steps
Awards section shows partners (Shopify Plus, Google, Meta, Klaviyo)
Navigation between all pages works correctly
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new frontend features tested and working. Site uses mock data from /app/frontend/src/data/mockData.js. Form submissions show toast notifications (MOCKED). Live Chat toggle button may be blocked by Emergent badge in dev - use force click or click on bubble notification instead. ResizeObserver warnings in console are non-critical.
tests_passed: Header dropdown menu appears on hover over 'Услуги' with 8 services
Top bar displays CIS countries: Russia, Ukraine, Kazakhstan, Belarus
Top bar shows contact info: email, phone, telegram
Hero section has 4 images in 2x2 grid layout (no overlap)
Live Chat bubble notification appears after 3 seconds
Live Chat window opens with welcome messages
Live Chat form has fields: name, phone, email, telegram, message
Contact page form has fields: name, email, phone, telegram, service, budget, message
Service selector dropdown works with all service options
Budget selector dropdown works with all budget options
'БЕСПЛАТНО' button escapes from cursor on mouse hover
'Кому мы подходим' section shows 6 categories: Стартапы, Действующий бизнес, Международные компании, D2C бренды, Быстрорастущие компании, Маркетплейсы
'Процесс от идеи до запуска' section shows 6 steps: Консультация, Аналитика и стратегия, Дизайн, Разработка, Запуск, Поддержка
Awards section displays 4 partners: Shopify Plus Partner, Google Partner, Meta Business Partner, Klaviyo Partner
Navigation to home via logo works
mocked_data_note: ALL DATA IS MOCKED - Site uses /app/frontend/src/data/mockData.js. Form submissions show toast notifications only, no actual backend integration.
